item.title: Fix issues of Projectile for better project management
item.description: Customize project detection We may like to control whether a folder should be guessed as a project root. Sometimes you may see a folder annoyingly being added to project list, e.g., HOME, Dropbox root. This is mostly likely due to default set of a long list for projectile-project-root-files. For better control, it is good to reset it. You may find the policy in the well-written Projectile Docs. 1 2 3 4 ;; control project root additional guess (besides ".
